charges.charge_description: 18:1951 INTERFERENCE WITH COMMERCE BY THREAT OR VIOLENCE (1-6)

charges.charge_disposition: ADJUDGED: 100 months imprisonment as to each count, to run concurrently with each other and any other sentence currently being served, and 3 years Supervised Release as to each count, to run concurrently with each other, and upon the following special conditions: 1. That the defendant not commit any federal, state or local crimes; 2. That the deft not possess illegal controlled substances; 3. That the deft shall refrain from any unlawful use of a controlled substance. The deft shall submit to one drug test within 15 days of release from imprisonment and at least two drug tests thereafter, as directed by the Probation Office (mandatory condition); 4. That the deft participate in a substance abuse program, which may include drug testing at the discretion and direction of the Probation Office; 5. That the deft is prohibited from possessing a firearm as defined in 18 U.S.C. 921; 6. that the deft pay restitution of $6, 288.76 immediately and any remaining balance on an installment basis of not less than 10 percent of his monthly gross income, as directed by the Probation Office. Restitution is payable as follows: a. $936.52 as determined for Overt Act 1/Count 2 to Hinomi Daitoku; b. $183.83 as determined for Overt Act 1/Count 2 to Budget Rent A Car System, Inc.; c. $644.32 as determined for Overt Act 2/Count 3 to Yukio Hoir; d. $280.00 as determined for Overt Act/Count 3 to Kenny Tran; e. $2,000.00 as determined for Overt Act 3/Count 4 to Tomizo Otsuki; f. $100.00 as determined for Overt Act 3/Count 4 to Nathalie Kodama; g. $544.32 as determined for Overt Act 4/Count 5 to be paid jointly and severally with coconspirator Stanley Edwards, Jr. to Hisao Enamoto; h. $1,599.77 as determined for Overt Act 5/Count 6 to be paid jointly and severally with conconspirator Jon Piohia to Hideo Yokoi; 7. That the deft provide the Probation Office access to any requested financial information; SA: $450.00; RECOMMENDATION: A facility on the West Coast, and when the deft qualifies, Sheridan, OR. That the deft participate in the 500-hour Comprehensive Drug Treatment Program and be enrolled in educational programs. be (1-6)
